feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.58.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • Feat: new billing page (#7840) @Louai-Zokerburg

üß© Pieces

  • feat: add SmartSuite integration (#7663) @Kunal-Darekar
  • feat(instantly.ai): Add Instantly Piece (#7604) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub
  • feat: implemented Zagomail piece (#7686) @gs03-dev
  • feat(coda): custom api call action (#7847) @rimjhimyadav
  • feat: comfyicu piece (#7845) @rimjhimyadav

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • chore: enhance custom property and its documentation (#7832) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: embed HTML was getting cached by browser (#7857) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: add migration to upgrade piece versions to latest for broken table flows (#7855) @abuaboud
  • fix: text for invalid steps note and importing flows toast had typos (#7844) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add Kunal-Darekar as a contributor for plugin (#7856) @allcontributors
  • docs: add gs03-dev as a contributor for plugin (#7849) @allcontributors
  • docs: add rimjhimyadav as a contributor for plugin (#7846) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Kunal-Darekar, @Louai-Zokerburg, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @gs03-dev, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @rimjhimyadav

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.59.0 (Skip to 0.60.0)
entry.content:
This release had a missing dependency that wasn't caught during building image

üß© Pieces

  • feat: kommo piece (#7648) @krushnarout
  • fix: publish piece script (#7913) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: beehiiv piece (#7633) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat: Close CRM (#7643) @Ani-4x
  • feat(docusign): get document, get envelope and list envelopes actions (#7890) @kishanprmr
  • feat(Wedof): Refactor webhook creation into a single function (#7884) @obenazouz-wedof
  • feat: add SmartSuite integration (#7663) @Kunal-Darekar
  • feat: implement motion piece with actions and triggers (#7867) @Sanket6652

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: sync git connection deletion on release and support git push (#7937) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: sync dev pieces cache path with worker execution files (#7914) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: only set project tasks limit when its new, while provisioning embedding users (#7886) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: change patch to post in billing and folders (#7853) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat(flow-run): sync webhook didn't extract payloads (#7858) @abuaboud
  • fix: embed HTML was getting cached by browser (#7857) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • chore: revamp embedding docs (#7892) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • chore: update endpoints schema (create-project, upsert-connection,folders) (#7891) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: remove approval piece (#7907) @abuaboud
  • refactor: karma, jasmine, & angular cleanup (#7904) @amrdb
  • refactor: unify isolate & process path (#7848) @abuaboud
  • fix: change patch to post in billing and folders (#7853) @Louai-Zokerburg

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @Ani-4x, @Kunal-Darekar, @Louai-Zokerburg, @Sanket6652, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @krushnarout, @obenazouz-wedof and @onyedikachi-david

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.59.1 (Skip to 0.60.0)
entry.content:
This release had a missing dependency that wasn't caught during building image

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(ui): update cmdk to bring in upstream fix (#7900) @TheSharpieOne

üé® Enhancements & Polish

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @TheSharpieOne and @hazemadelkhalel

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.60.0
entry.content: This is a release that includes the missing dependency that 0.59.X didn't include

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.60.1
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add env var to disable automatic flow enabling on publish (#7953) @hazemadelkhalel

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: ignore project memebers associated with soft deleted projects (#7960) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: ensure the vendor navigation listener is set before resolving he configure method promise (#7956) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer and @hazemadelkhalel
